articles.title: PSG's Neymar to miss Champions League clash with Barcelona - ESPN.co.uk
articles.description: PSG forward Neymar has been ruled out for four weeks due to a hip injury and will miss the Champions League round-of-16 first-leg clash with Barca.
articles.content:
Paris Saint-Germain forward Neymar has been ruled out for four weeks because of a hip injury and will miss the Champions League round-of-16 first-leg clash with Barcelona at Camp Nou on Tuesday.
